sources.data_found: Palmetto 2 statistics: 1,206 compute nodes and 1,615 GPUs total.
5 new AI/ML nodes added to Palmetto 2; each node has 8x NVIDIA H100 80G GPUs (Dell PowerEdge XE9680).
Palmetto 2 includes specialized AI/ML nodes with 8-way NVLINK H100 or H200 GPUs for a total of 80 Hopper GPUs.
40 new nodes added to Palmetto; each node has 2x NVIDIA A100 GPUs.
GPU model codes listed as available on Palmetto 2: H200, H100, L40S, A40, A100, V100S, V100, P100, K40, K20; also notes A100 exists in both 80GB and 40GB variants.

student_data.notes: All models attempted to access Clemson OIR Data/Reports (CommonDataSet 2024-2025 and 2024 Fact Sheet). Access to PDF content was restricted via Clemson Box (JavaScript requirements) and Digital Commons (403 Forbidden). The Interactive Factbook backend returned 502 Bad Gateway. No verifiable CS-specific enrollment counts for Fall 2024 or AY 2024-2025 could be retrieved; counts set to 0.

gpu_resources.notes: Palmetto 2 cluster total GPUs explicitly stated as 1,615. Confirmed counts: 40 H100 (5 nodes x 8 GPUs, XE9680/NVLINK). 80 total Hopper GPUs listed (H100+H200), implying 40 H200s exist alongside the confirmed H100s. 80 A100s confirmed from Dec 2022 expansion. Remaining GPU counts (A100 variants, V100, P100, L40S, A40) are estimates derived from available hardware lists to sum exactly to the stated 1,615 total.

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini models.
